name: Mojyamon
effect: [Your Turn] While your opponent has no Digimon with digivolution cards in play, this Digimon gains ＜Jamming＞. (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon.)
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking] Trash 1 digivolution card from the bottom of 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
